channel.title: Help me with making this, plz!
channel.description:
help me with making this, plz!
my drops don't work in my server, even if i putted drops in, they don't show up!. so i thaught a reward system for killing npc's would be also good enough, it would be a sort of drop. could someone help me with making the following thing.
a reward system for killing npc's. so if i killed 1 guards it gives me a random item in my inventory. or it gives just 1 item. i think 1 item would be easyer to make. but i don't know how to make a reward system for npc's. could someone make for me a reward system for me. or just a begin. i could add the voids and that stuff i qeuss. because my drops don't work and i want drops or rewards for killing npc's in my server! i give 20% creds on my server to the one that helpd me. also more change to get admin! plz help me out!

item.title: Help me with making this, plz!
item.dc:creator: @junkyNL junkyNL
item.description:
@junkyNL wrote:

well, my drops don’t work, so if i added a drop. it doesn’t show the drop on the ground. so know i need to make a system so if i killed a monster that it gives a random reward. because that it is a sort of drop. it doesn’t matther if it’s on the floor or in the inventory. i need to make a system that gives sort of drops, or a reward system for killing npcs.[br][size=1]Posted on: March 30, 2007, 02:43:46 PM[/size][hr]help?

Read full topic
item.source: Help me with making this, plz!

item.title: Help me with making this, plz!
item.dc:creator: @Slivion Slivion
item.description:
@Slivion wrote:

You want the item to appear in the inventory or on the floor.

Read full topic
